subject: Re: JUnit and JDK1.4.2
msgSnippet: ... I haven t ... yet. ... Had to say much with more information. Are your tests depending on API that has changed.. or on some undocumented
messageBody:
> Has anyone encountered problems while using JDK1.4.2?

I haven't ... yet.

> Certain components like menuitems are not being found. The problems
> are repeatable but they are localised to certain tests alone and are
> not present across test cases.

Had to say much with more information.

Are your tests depending on API that has changed.. or on some
undocumented features/side-effects?

Dave
